name: The Mazescapist
description:
(Version 0.15)You are a square, and you need to escape a maze full of teleporters, enemies, switches, and lava. Will you get out the passive or the aggresive way.

This is in very early beta, with many bugs and glitches, some i have not even found yet, so please notify me if you find any bugs. 

0.20 update (upcoming) Patching and squashing bugs.

0.30 (upcoming)  Addition of skins and  something else maybe.

0.40 (upcoming) More levels in both endings, completely redo the aggresive ending.

0.50 (upcoming) third ending.
